# <code>zip</code> for filters

<div class='command-title'>Combine a stream with the input</div>

## Signature

```> zip <other>```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Parameters

 * ```other <Any>```: the other input
## Examples

  Zip multiple streams and get one of the results
```shell
  > 1..3 | zip 4..6
```
